cause.description:
Beginning with those close to us, and spreading like wildfire to everyone, Happiness for all!
Seven degrees of separation; by bringing happiness to those close to us, we can spread an epidemic of joy, even just to one person, the ripple's will spread far beyond expectation.
Join the group at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2608196347
1. Happiness is a basic human right.
2. Happiness should be shared, with or without consent.
3. Happiness should be everyone's #1 desire.
cause.mission: To give happiness to all, starting with those dear to us.
cause.name: Happiness 4 All
